member.name: T:DispatcherInvokeExtensions
member.summary: Helpers for easily invoking via the using an or a delegate or lambda.

member.name: M:DispatcherInvokeExtensions.BeginInvoke(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Action)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments on the thread that the System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher was created on.
member.param: The dispatcher to invoke the action on.
The action to execute via the dispatcher.

member.name: M:DispatcherInvokeExtensions.BeginInvoke(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Action,System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments on the thread that the System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher was created on.
member.param: The dispatcher to invoke the action on.
The action to execute via the dispatcher.
The priority to execute the action with.

member.name: M:DispatcherInvokeExtensions.Invoke(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Action)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: The dispatcher to invoke the action on.
The action to execute via the dispatcher.

member.name: M:DispatcherInvokeExtensions.Invoke(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Action,System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: The dispatcher to invoke the action on.
The action to execute via the dispatcher.
The priority to execute the action with.

member.returns: The return value from the delegate being invoked
